abstract: United States Geological Society study finds cold-loving fungus already linked to a disease that has killed more than a million bats in the eastern United States definitively causes the fast-spreading malady; findings are published in journal Nature.
snippet: A cold-loving fungus already linked to a disease that has killed more than a million bats in the eastern United States definitively causes the fast-spreading malady, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A cold-loving fungus already linked to a disease that has killed more than a million bats in the eastern United States definitively causes the fast-spreading malady, officials said.

headline.main: Fungus Is Confirmed as Causing Disease That Kills Bats
headline.print_headline: Fungus Is Confirmed as Causing Disease That Kills Bats
headline.seo: Bat-Killing Disease Caused by Fungus, Study Confirms
